title: I Can Do It Myself!
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>Bring the Obi to the front, and move this part like this....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Oh, I see~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>It may be the simplest way to tie it, but you can add an obi clip or a hair stick between the obi to make it more elegant.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>You can design it in so many ways, huh? Thank you, Shioriko-chan! I think I’ve learned a little more about how yukatas work!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’m sure you can put it on yourself now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah. I’ve worn yukata-like costumes before, but there are so many things you can’t learn just from videos and books for proper yukatas, so this really helped me out. Thank you again, Shioriko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Don’t mind it. I’m glad I could be of help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>This yukata is yours, right, Shioriko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes. It’s my practice yukata for summer.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Then, would you let me make your yukata for the summer festival we will all go to?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eeeh!? No, I can’t possibly impose on you like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s my way of repaying you for today. Would you please accept it? Besides, Kotori really wants to make it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>T-, then, if you insist. I’ll look forward to it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
